channel.title: Tools on Leonardo Borges
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Leonardo Borges

item.title: how do you keep yourself focused
item.description: This is basically a compilation of a few tools/habits that I use to keep focused and at a high level of productivity when working alone. Works great for me and I hope there are useful tips for you as well. Music This is one of my favorites. When working alone I hate having noisy people around, which happens quite often if you work in an open office space like me.
